original_text: In keeping with the ordinance of his father David, he appointed the divisions of the priests for their duties, and the Levites to lead the praise and to assist the priests according to each day’s requirement. He also appointed the gatekeepers by divisions for the various gates, because this was what David the man of God had ordered.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 또 그의 아버지 다윗의 규례를 따라 제사장들의 반열을 정하여 섬기게 하고 레위 사람들에게도 그 직분을 맡겨 매일의 일과대로 찬송하며 제사장들 앞에서 수종들게 하며 또 문지기들에게 그 반열을 따라 각 문을 지키게 하였으니 이는 하나님의 사람 다윗이 전에 이렇게 명령하였음이라

sentences.original_text: In keeping with the ordinance of his father David
he appointed the divisions of the priests for their duties
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 제사장들에게 직무를 맡겨 분대를 나누었다

sentences.original_text: and the Levites to lead the praise
and to assist the priests according to each day's requirement
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 매일의 요구에 따라 제사장들을 돕게 했다

sentences.original_text: He also appointed the gatekeepers by divisions
because this was what David the man of God had ordered
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 이것은 하나님의 사람 다윗이 명령한 것이었기 때문이다
